You don't need 10 to make a good album. You'reputting quality over quantity, even if it's no more than say, 5, they will 5 damn good beats.

"@Background Pony #2E1A":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549672316368722f06f60900#post_549672316368722f06f60900

i was meaning the package i release wont be considered an album unless it has a minimum of 10 songs.

since normally on minimum an album needs 10 songs to be considered an album

any less would be an Extended Play
